snippet.title: Pfister, Depp reunite for sci-fi 'Transcendence'
snippet.description: For more than a decade, cinematographer Wally Pfister brought director Christopher Nolan's cinematic visions to life. Now, he's the one calling the shots.

snippet.title: Judge won't halt 2nd sanity review of James Holmes
snippet.description: The judge in the Colorado theater shooting case on Monday rejected defense lawyers' attempts to block a second sanity evaluation of defendant James Holmes.

snippet.title: 1957 was the best-ever year for movies (and other surprising insights from IMDb)

snippet.title: 'The Incredibles' sequel has a lot to teach other superhero movies
snippet.description: "The Incredibles" was ahead of its time in telling a different kind of superhero story. Summer blockbusters could learn from its example.
